SEARCH
Package microsim.simulation.component.device.video

Class VideoRenderer

java.lang.Object
microsim.simulation.component.device.video.VideoRenderer
public class VideoRenderer extends Object
Implements a rendering component for the VideoDevice device, responsible of keeping a frame buffer and rendering to it. Functions in text mode, with bitmap characters read from a file and loaded into a buffered image cache. Also handles cursor drawing and blinking.

      public void setCursorColumn(int val)
      Sets the column of the cursor.
      Parameters:
      val - column to update to

    • render

      public void render()
      Renders frame buffer from read VRAM. Characters in VRAM are comprised of a bytes representing extended ASCII code points. If the cursor coordinates are within the frame buffer, it is drawn or not depending on the current blink timer.

    • getCharSprite

      private BufferedImage getCharSprite(int ch)
      Gets a buffered image representing a character from its extended ASCII code point.
      Parameters:
      ch - character code point
      Returns:
      character image
